problem_text_cn: 如图,四边形ABCD为⊙O的内接四边形,若∠BCD=110°,则∠BAD的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the quadrilateral ABCD is the inscribed quadrilateral of ⊙O, if ∠BCD = N_0, then the degree of ∠BAD is ()
raw_answer: 试题分析:根据圆内接四边形的对角互补求∠BAD的度数即可:∵四边形ABCD为⊙O的内接四边形,∴∠BCD+∠BAD=180°(圆内接四边形的对角互补);又∵∠BCD=110°,∴∠BAD=70°.故选D.
